item.text: After this Jesus traveled throughout Galilee. He stayed out of Judea because the Jewish leaders wanted to kill him.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish</st> <st data-num="01859">Feast</st> of <st data-num="4634">Shelters</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1451" class="">near</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">advised</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="3327">Leave</st> <st data-num="1782" class="">here</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> may <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">miracles</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> you are <st data-num="4160" class="">performing</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> who <st data-num="2212" class="">seeks</st> to <st data-num="1510">make</st> a <st data-num="3954" class="">reputation</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4160" class="">does</st> <st data-num="5100">anything</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2927" class="">secret</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> you are <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st>, <st data-num="5319" class="">show</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st> to the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.”
(For not even his own brothers believed in him.)
So Jesus replied, “My time has not yet arrived, but you are ready at any opportunity!

The <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="3404" class="">hate</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> it <st data-num="3404" class="">hates</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="3140" class="">testifying</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st>.

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="305" class="">go up</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1859" class="">feast</st> yourselves. <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="3768" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3768" class="">going up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1859" class="">feast</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4137" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3768" class="">not yet</st> <st data-num="4137">fully arrived</st>.”<n id="4" />
When he had said this, he remained in Galilee.
But when his brothers had gone up to the feast, then Jesus himself also went up, not openly but in secret.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="2453">Jewish leaders</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="2212">looking for</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="1859" class="">feast</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">asking</st>, “<st data-num="4226">Where</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">he</st>?”<n id="2" />

There <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4183">a lot</st> of <st data-num="1112" class="">grumbling</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3303" class="">Some</st> were <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “He <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="18">good man</st>,” <st data-num="1161">but</st> <st data-num="243" class="">others</st>, “He <st data-num="4105" class="">deceives</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">common people</st>.”<n id="4" />
However, no one spoke openly about him for fear of the Jewish leaders.
When the feast was half over, Jesus went up to the temple courts and began to teach.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="2453">Jewish leaders</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="2296" class="">astonished</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="4459">How</st> does <st data-num="3778" class="">this man</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> so much when he has <st data-num="3361" class="">never</st> <st data-num="3129">had</st> <st data-num="1121">formal instruction</st>?”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1699">My</st> <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1699">from me</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> from the one who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="846">God’s</st> <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st>,<n id="1" /> he will <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> my <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st>, <st data-num="4220" class="">whether</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2228">or</st> whether <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1683">my own</st> authority.<n id="2" />

The person who <st data-num="2980" class="">speaks</st> <st data-num="575">on</st> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> authority<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2212" class="">desires</st><n id="2" /> to receive <st data-num="1391" class="">honor</st><n id="3" /> for <st data-num="2398" class="">himself;</st> the one who <st data-num="2212" class="">desires</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="1391" class="">honor</st><n id="5" /> of the one who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a man of <st data-num="227" class="">integrity</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="93" class="">unrighteousness</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
Hasn’t Moses given you the law? Yet not one of you keeps the law! Why do you want to kill me?”
The crowd answered, “You’re possessed by a demon! Who is trying to kill you?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="4160" class="">performed</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">miracle</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you are <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2296" class="">amazed</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1223 3778">However, because</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the practice of <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcision</st><n id="1" /> (<st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">forefathers)</st>, you <st data-num="4059" class="">circumcise</st> a <st data-num="444">male child</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>.

But <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">male child</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcised</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> of <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> is <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3089" class="">broken</st>,<n id="3" /> why are you <st data-num="5520" class="">angry</st> with <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> I <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">completely</st> <st data-num="5199" class="">well</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4521" class="">Sabbath</st>?
Do not judge according to external appearance, but judge with proper judgment.”
Then some of the residents of Jerusalem began to say, “Isn’t this the man they are trying to kill?

<st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st> <st data-num="2396">here</st> he is, <st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="3954" class="">publicly</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they are <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="2" /> Do the <st data-num="758">ruling authorities</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="230" class="">really</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3778">this man</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>?<n id="5" />
But we know where this man comes from. Whenever the Christ comes, no one will know where he comes from.”

Then Jesus, while teaching in the temple courts, cried out, “You both know me and know where I come from! And I have not come on my own initiative, but the one who sent me is true. You do not know him,
but I know him because I have come from him and he sent me.”
So then they tried to seize Jesus, but no one laid a hand on him because his time had not yet come.
Yet many of the crowd believed in him and said, “Whenever the Christ comes, he won’t perform more miraculous signs than this man did, will he?”
The Pharisees heard the crowd murmuring these things about Jesus, so the chief priests and the Pharisees sent officers to arrest him.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “I will <st data-num="1510">be</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> for only a <st data-num="3398" class="">little</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">while</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">longer</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="2532" class="">then</st><n id="2" /> I am <st data-num="5217" class="">going</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the one who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
You will look for me but will not find me, and where I am you cannot come.”
Then the Jewish leaders said to one another, “Where is he going to go that we cannot find him? He is not going to go to the Jewish people dispersed among the Greeks and teach the Greeks, is he?
What did he mean by saying, ‘You will look for me but will not find me, and where I am you cannot come’?”
On the last day of the feast, the greatest day, Jesus stood up and shouted out, “If anyone is thirsty, let him come to me, and
let the one who believes in me drink. Just as the scripture says, ‘From within him will flow rivers of living water.’”
(Now he said this about the Spirit, whom those who believed in him were going to receive, for the Spirit had not yet been given because Jesus was not yet glorified.)
When they heard these words, some of the crowd began to say, “This really is the Prophet!”

<st data-num="243" class="">Others</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>!”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> still others <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3361">No</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> doesn’t <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st>, does he?<n id="3" />
Don’t the scriptures say that the Christ is a descendant of David and comes from Bethlehem, the village where David lived?”

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> there <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="4978" class="">division</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> <st data-num="846">Jesus</st>.<n id="2" />
Some of them were wanting to seize him, but no one laid a hand on him.
Then the officers returned to the chief priests and Pharisees, who said to them, “Why didn’t you bring him back with you?”

The <st data-num="5257" class="">officers</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>, “No one <st data-num="3763" class="">ever</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="3779" class="">like</st> this <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>!”

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4771">You</st> <st data-num="3361">haven’t</st> been <st data-num="4105" class="">deceived</st> <st data-num="2532">too</st>, have you?<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3361 5100">None</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="758">members of the ruling counci</st>l<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st> have <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, have they?<n id="2" />
But this rabble who do not know the law are accursed!”
Nicodemus, who had gone to Jesus before and who was one of the rulers, said,

“<st data-num="1473">Our</st> <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="3361">doesn’t</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">condemn</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1437 3361">unless</st> it <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hears</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">learns</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> he is <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st>, does it?”<n id="3" />
They replied, “You aren’t from Galilee too, are you? Investigate carefully and you will see that no prophet comes from Galilee!”
[[And each one departed to his own house.
